definition: the entire nation/the whole country, from the leadership to the rank and file
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The entire country is behind Qi，and the home-Sheng everything.
sentences.chinese: 舉國上下齊歡暢，家和國盛萬事興。

sentences.english: On hearing of the victory , the nation was transported with joy.
sentences.chinese: 聽到勝利的消息，舉國上下一片歡騰。

sentences.english: The entire country is behind Qi， and the home-Sheng everything.
sentences.chinese: 舉國上下齊歡暢，家和國盛萬事興。

sentences.english: The whole nation is looking at the team now - but do you like that?
sentences.chinese: 當前舉國上下都在關注國家隊，你怎麼看？

sentences.english: Back-to-Front Day has been celebrated today throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 今天舉國上下歡慶顛倒日。

sentences.english: There is solid unity throughout the nation.
The whole country will be wishing them every happiness.
sentences.chinese: 舉國上下都會祝願他們永遠幸福的。

sentences.english: There is broad consensus in the country on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 對這一問題舉國上下看法普遍一致。

sentences.english: Wearied by the tyranny of the government, poor people all over the country raised the standard of revolt.
sentences.chinese: 舉國上下的貧苦大衆不堪政府的暴政，紛紛揭竿起義。

sentences.english: The entire country is behind Qi, and the home-Sheng everything. This grand festival will bring you everlasting lucky!
sentences.chinese: 舉國上下齊歡暢，家和國盛萬事興。

sentences.english: After the president was assassinated, the whole country was in deep sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 楅總統被謀殺了，舉國上下沉浸在悲哀之中。

sentences.english: Bfter the president was assassinated, the whole country was in deep sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 總統被行刺了，舉國上下叮噹貓在家沉醉在悲哀之中。

sentences.english: The entire country is behind Qi, and the home-Sheng everything.
sentences.chinese: 舉國上下齊悲痛，家和國盛萬事興。
